00040 EntityTopology TriLagrangeShape::element_topology() const
00041   { return TRIANGLE; }
00042   
00043 int TriLagrangeShape::num_nodes() const
00044   { return 6; }
00045 
00046 NodeSet TriLagrangeShape::sample_points( NodeSet ns ) const
00047 {
00048   if (ns.have_any_mid_node()) {
00049     ns.set_all_corner_nodes(TRIANGLE);
00050   }
00051   else {
00052     ns.clear();
00053     ns.set_mid_face_node(0);
00054   }
00055   return ns;
00056 }
00057 
00058 void TriLagrangeShape::coefficients( Sample loc,
00059                                      NodeSet nodeset,
00060                                      double* coeff_out,
00061                                      size_t* indices_out,
00062                                      size_t& num_coeff,
00063                                      MsqError& err ) const
00064 {
00065   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_face_node()) {
00066     MSQ_SETERR(err)("TriLagrangeShape does not support mid-element nodes",
00067                     MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00068     return;
00069   }
00070   
00071   switch (loc.dimension) {
00072     case 0:
00073       num_coeff = 1;
00074       indices_out[0] = loc.number;
00075       coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00076       break;
00077     case 1:
00078       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(loc.number)) { // if mid-edge node is present
00079         num_coeff = 1;
00080         indices_out[0] = 3+loc.number;
00081         coeff_out[0] = 1.0;
00082       }
00083       else { // no mid node on edge
00084         num_coeff = 2;
00085         indices_out[0] = loc.number;
00086         indices_out[1] = (loc.number+1)%3;
00087         coeff_out[0] = 0.5;
00088         coeff_out[1] = 0.5;
00089       }
00090       break;
00091     case 2:
00092       num_coeff = 3;
00093       indices_out[0] = 0;
00094       indices_out[1] = 1;
00095       indices_out[2] = 2;
00096       coeff_out[0] = 1.0/3.0;
00097       coeff_out[1] = 1.0/3.0;
00098       coeff_out[2] = 1.0/3.0;
00099       for (int i = 0; i < 3; ++i) { // for each mid-edge node
00100         if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(i)) { // if node is present
00101           indices_out[num_coeff] = i+3;
00102             // coeff for mid-edge node
00103           coeff_out[num_coeff] = 4.0/9.0;
00104             // adjust coeff for adj corner nodes
00105           coeff_out[i]       -= 2.0/9.0;
00106           coeff_out[(i+1)%3] -= 2.0/9.0;
00107             // update count
00108           ++num_coeff;
00109         }
00110       }
00111       break;
00112     default:
00113       MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT,
00114                   "Request for dimension %d mapping function value"
00115                   "for a triangular element", loc.dimension);
00116   }
00117 }
00118 
00119 static inline void get_linear_derivatives( size_t* vertices,
00120                                            MsqVector<2>* derivs )
00121 {
00122   vertices[0] = 0;
00123   vertices[1] = 1;
00124   vertices[2] = 2;
00125   derivs[0][0] = -1.0;
00126   derivs[0][1] = -1.0;
00127   derivs[1][0] =  1.0;
00128   derivs[1][1] =  0.0;
00129   derivs[2][0] =  0.0;
00130   derivs[2][1] =  1.0;
00131 }  
00132 
00133 static void derivatives_at_corner( unsigned corner,
00134                                    NodeSet nodeset,
00135                                    size_t* vertices,
00136                                    MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00137                                    size_t& num_vtx )
00138 {
00139   num_vtx = 3;
00140   get_linear_derivatives( vertices, derivs );
00141   switch (corner) {
00142     case 0:
00143       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(0)) {
00144         vertices[num_vtx] = 3;
00145         derivs[num_vtx][0] = 4.0;
00146         derivs[num_vtx][1] = 0.0;
00147         ++num_vtx;
00148         derivs[0][0] -= 2.0;
00149         derivs[1][0] -= 2.0;
00150       }
00151       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(2)) {
00152         vertices[num_vtx] = 5;
00153         derivs[num_vtx][0] = 0.0;
00154         derivs[num_vtx][1] = 4.0;
00155         ++num_vtx;
00156         derivs[0][1] -= 2.0;
00157         derivs[2][1] -= 2.0;
00158       }
00159       break;
00160     
00161     case 1:
00162       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(0)) {
00163         vertices[num_vtx] = 3;
00164         derivs[num_vtx][0] = -4.0;
00165         derivs[num_vtx][1] = -4.0;
00166         ++num_vtx;
00167         derivs[0][0] += 2.0;
00168         derivs[0][1] += 2.0;
00169         derivs[1][0] += 2.0;
00170         derivs[1][1] += 2.0;
00171       }
00172       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(1)) {
00173         vertices[num_vtx] = 4;
00174         derivs[num_vtx][0] = 0.0;
00175         derivs[num_vtx][1] = 4.0;
00176         ++num_vtx;
00177         derivs[1][1] -= 2.0;
00178         derivs[2][1] -= 2.0;
00179       }
00180       break;
00181     
00182     case 2:
00183       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(1)) {
00184         vertices[num_vtx] = 4;
00185         derivs[num_vtx][0] = 4.0;
00186         derivs[num_vtx][1] = 0.0;
00187         ++num_vtx;
00188         derivs[1][0] -= 2.0;
00189         derivs[2][0] -= 2.0;
00190       }
00191       if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(2)) {
00192         vertices[num_vtx] = 5;
00193         derivs[num_vtx][0] = -4.0;
00194         derivs[num_vtx][1] = -4.0;
00195         ++num_vtx;
00196         derivs[0][0] += 2.0;
00197         derivs[0][1] += 2.0;
00198         derivs[2][0] += 2.0;
00199         derivs[2][1] += 2.0;
00200       }
00201       break;
00202   }
00203 }
00204 
00205 static const double edr[3][3] = { { 0.0,-2.0, 2.0 },
00206                                   { 0.0, 2.0, 2.0 },
00207                                   { 0.0,-2.0,-2.0 } };
00208 static const double eds[3][3] = { {-2.0,-2.0, 0.0 },
00209                                   { 2.0, 2.0, 0.0 },
00210                                   { 2.0,-2.0, 0.0 } };
00211 
00212 static void derivatives_at_mid_edge( unsigned edge, 
00213                                      NodeSet nodeset,
00214                                      size_t* vertices,
00215                                      MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00216                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00217 {
00218     // The mid-edge behavior is rather strange.
00219     // A corner vertex contributes to the jacobian
00220     // at the mid-point of the opposite edge unless
00221     // one, but *not* both of the adjacent mid-edge
00222     // nodes is present.
00223     
00224     // The value for each corner is incremented when 
00225     // a mid-side node is present.  If the value is
00226     // 0 when finished, the corner doesn't contribute.
00227     // Initialize values to 0 for corners adjacent to
00228     // edge so they are never zero.
00229   int corner_count[3] = { 1, 1, 1 };
00230   corner_count[(edge+2)%3] = -1;
00231   
00232     // begin with derivatives for linear tri
00233   double corner_derivs[3][2] = { {-1.0,-1.0 },
00234                                  { 1.0, 0.0 },
00235                                  { 0.0, 1.0 } };
00236   
00237     // do mid-side nodes first
00238   num_vtx = 0;
00239   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00240     if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(i)) {
00241       vertices[num_vtx] =  i+3 ;
00242       derivs[num_vtx][0] =  edr[i][edge] ;
00243       derivs[num_vtx][1] =  eds[i][edge] ;
00244       ++num_vtx;
00245 
00246       int a = (i+1)%3;
00247       corner_derivs[i][0] -= 0.5 * edr[i][edge];
00248       corner_derivs[i][1] -= 0.5 * eds[i][edge];
00249       corner_derivs[a][0] -= 0.5 * edr[i][edge];
00250       corner_derivs[a][1] -= 0.5 * eds[i][edge];
00251       ++corner_count[i];
00252       ++corner_count[a];
00253     }
00254   }
00255   
00256     // now add corner nodes to list
00257   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00258     if (corner_count[i]) {
00259       vertices[num_vtx] = i;
00260       derivs[num_vtx][0] = corner_derivs[i][0];
00261       derivs[num_vtx][1] = corner_derivs[i][1];
00262       ++num_vtx;
00263     }
00264   }
00265 }
00266 
00267 static const double fdr[] = { 0.0,     4.0/3.0, -4.0/3.0 };
00268 static const double fds[] = {-4.0/3.0, 4.0/3.0,  0.0     };
00269        
00270 static void derivatives_at_mid_elem( NodeSet nodeset,
00271                                      size_t* vertices,
00272                                      MsqVector<2>* derivs,
00273                                      size_t& num_vtx )
00274 {
00275   get_linear_derivatives( vertices, derivs );
00276   num_vtx = 3;
00277   for (unsigned i = 0; i < 3; ++i) {
00278     if (nodeset.mid_edge_node(i)) {
00279       vertices[num_vtx] = i+3;
00280       derivs[num_vtx][0] = fdr[i];
00281       derivs[num_vtx][1] = fds[i];
00282       ++num_vtx;
00283        
00284       int a = (i+1)%3;
00285       derivs[i][0] -= 0.5 * fdr[i];
00286       derivs[i][1] -= 0.5 * fds[i];
00287       derivs[a][0] -= 0.5 * fdr[i];
00288       derivs[a][1] -= 0.5 * fds[i];
00289     }
00290   }
00291 }
00292 
00293 void TriLagrangeShape::derivatives( Sample loc,
00294                                     NodeSet nodeset,
00295                                     size_t* vertex_indices_out,
00296                                     MsqVector<2>* d_coeff_d_xi_out,
00297                                     size_t& num_vtx,
00298                                     MsqError& err ) const
00299 {
00300   if (!nodeset.have_any_mid_node()) {
00301     num_vtx = 3;
00302     get_linear_derivatives( vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out );
00303     return;
00304   }
00305 
00306   if (nodeset.have_any_mid_face_node()) {
00307     MSQ_SETERR(err)("TriLagrangeShape does not support mid-element nodes",
00308                     MsqError::UNSUPPORTED_ELEMENT);
00309     return;
00310   }
00311   
00312   switch (loc.dimension) {
00313     case 0:
00314       derivatives_at_corner( loc.number, nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00315       break;
00316     case 1:
00317       derivatives_at_mid_edge( loc.number, nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00318       break;
00319     case 2:
00320       derivatives_at_mid_elem( nodeset, vertex_indices_out, d_coeff_d_xi_out, num_vtx );
00321       break;
00322     default:
00323       MSQ_SETERR(err)("Invalid/unsupported logical dimension",MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00324   }
00325 }
00326 
00327 
00328 void TriLagrangeShape::ideal( Sample , 
00329                               MsqMatrix<3,2>& J,
00330                               MsqError&  ) const
00331 {
00332 //  const double g = 1.074569931823542; // sqrt(2/sqrt(3));
00333 //  J(0,0) = g;    J(0,1) = 0.5*g;
00334 //  J(1,0) = 0.0;  J(1,1) = 1.0/g;
00335 //  J(2,0) = 0.0;  J(2,1) = 0.0;
00336     const double a = 0.70710678118654746; // 1/sqrt(2)
00337     const double b = 1.3160740129524924;  // 4th root of 3
00338     J(0,0) = -a/b; J(0,1) =  a/b;
00339     J(1,0) = -a*b; J(1,1) = -a*b;
00340     J(2,0) =  0.0; J(2,1) =  0.0;
00341 }
